page.title: 18Home Life - Survey Data
page.content: The following data is based on results of questionnaires distributed by children. There are 549 dwellings, to which questionnaires were delivered (approx. lOO returned). Of the dwellings 48% detached, 2l% semi and 3l% terraced. The majority of people travel to their jobs, which are varied ranging from teachers at lO%, engineers, civil servants and farmers at 7%, down to police, fireman, welder, electrician, nurse and printers all at 4% or less. 67% of households have a car, 8% two cars and l7% motorcycles or bicycles. Cats and/or dogs are kept as pets by 5O% , birds, goldfish or rabbits by about l3%. The Eastern Daily Press, covering both national and local news, is read by 55%. Only 6% read national dailies. {(continued on page l9)
